item.text: From Paul, a slave of Christ Jesus, called to be an apostle, set apart for the gospel of God.

<st data-num="3739">This gospel</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="4279">promised beforehand</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="1124" class="">scriptures</st>,

<st data-num="4012" class="">concerning</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> who <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="1537 4690">descendant</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="1138" class="">David</st> <st data-num="2596">with reference to</st> the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st>,<n id="2" />

who was <st data-num="3724" class="">appointed</st> the <st data-num="5207">Son</st>-of-<st data-num="2316">God</st>-<st data-num="1722">in</st>-<st data-num="1411">power</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> the <st data-num="42" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="386" class="">resurrection</st><n id="3" /> from the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>, <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>.

<st data-num="1223" class="">Through</st> <st data-num="3739">him</st><n id="1" /> we have <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> our <st data-num="651" class="">apostleship</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> bring about the <st data-num="5218" class="">obedience</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st> <st data-num="5228">on behalf of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>.

<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="3739">them</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2822" class="">called</st> to belong to <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.<n id="2" />
To all those loved by God in Rome, called to be saints: Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ!
First of all, I thank my God through Jesus Christ for all of you, because your faith is proclaimed throughout the whole world.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> I <st data-num="3000" class="">serve</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st>, <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3144" class="">witness</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">that</st><n id="2" /> I <st data-num="89" class="">continually</st> <st data-num="3417" class="">remember</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>,

and I <st data-num="3842" class="">always</st> <st data-num="1189" class="">ask</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4335" class="">prayers</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st>, <st data-num="4458" class="">perhaps</st> <st data-num="2235" class="">now</st> <st data-num="4218">at last</st> I may <st data-num="2137" class="">succeed</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">visiting</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722">according to</st> the <st data-num="2307" class="">will</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I <st data-num="1971" class="">long</st> to <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> I may <st data-num="3330" class="">impart</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> <st data-num="4152" class="">spiritual</st> <st data-num="5486" class="">gift</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4741" class="">strengthen</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>,

<st data-num="3778">that</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st>, that we may be <st data-num="4837">mutually comforted</st> <st data-num="1223">by</st> <st data-num="240">one another’s</st> <st data-num="4102">faith</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5037" class="">both</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">yours</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">mine</st>.

I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to be <st data-num="50" class="">unaware</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers and sisters</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754">that</st> I <st data-num="4178" class="">often</st> <st data-num="4388" class="">intended</st> to <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> (<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> was <st data-num="2967" class="">prevented</st> <st data-num="891" class="">until</st> <st data-num="1204" class="">now)</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> I may <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> <st data-num="2590" class="">fruit</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2531">just as</st> I already have <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="3062" class="">rest</st> of the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st>.<n id="3" />

I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> a <st data-num="3781" class="">debtor</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5037" class="">both</st> to the <st data-num="1672" class="">Greeks</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to the <st data-num="915" class="">barbarians</st>, <st data-num="5037" class="">both</st> to the <st data-num="4680" class="">wise</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to the <st data-num="453" class="">foolish</st>.
Thus I am eager also to preach the gospel to you who are in Rome.
For I am not ashamed of the gospel, for it is God’s power for salvation to everyone who believes, to the Jew first and also to the Greek.
For the righteousness of God is revealed in the gospel from faith to faith, just as it is written, “The righteous by faith will live.”
For the wrath of God is revealed from heaven against all ungodliness and unrighteousness of people who suppress the truth by their unrighteousness,

<st data-num="1360">because</st> what can be <st data-num="1110" class="">known</st> about <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="5318">plain</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="5319" class="">made</st> it <st data-num="5319" class="">plain</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="575" class="">since</st> the <st data-num="2937" class="">creation</st> of the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="517">invisible attributes</st>—<st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="126" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2305">divine nature</st>—have been <st data-num="2529">clearly seen</st> because they <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3539" class="">understood</st> through what has been <st data-num="4161" class="">made</st>. <st data-num="1519">So</st> <st data-num="846" class="">people</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="379">without excuse</st>.

<st data-num="1360" class="">For</st> although they <st data-num="1097" class="">knew</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, they did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1392" class="">glorify</st> him <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2168" class="">give</st> him <st data-num="2168" class="">thanks</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> they became <st data-num="3154" class="">futile</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="1261" class="">thoughts</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="801" class="">senseless</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st><n id="1" /> were <st data-num="4654" class="">darkened</st>.
Although they <st data-num="5335" class="">claimed</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="4680" class="">wise</st>, they became <st data-num="3471" class="">fools</st>
and exchanged the glory of the immortal God for an image resembling mortal human beings or birds or four-footed animals or reptiles.
Therefore God gave them over in the desires of their hearts to impurity, to dishonor their bodies among themselves.
They exchanged the truth of God for a lie and worshiped and served the creation rather than the Creator, who is blessed forever! Amen.
For this reason God gave them over to dishonorable passions. For their women exchanged the natural sexual relations for unnatural ones,

and likewise the men also abandoned natural relations with women and were inflamed in their passions for one another. Men committed shameless acts with men and received in themselves the due penalty for their error.
And just as they did not see fit to acknowledge God, God gave them over to a depraved mind, to do what should not be done.

They are <st data-num="4137" class="">filled</st><n id="1" /> with <st data-num="3956">every kind</st> of <st data-num="93" class="">unrighteousness</st>, <st data-num="4189" class="">wickedness</st>, <st data-num="4124" class="">covetousness</st>, <st data-num="2549" class="">malice</st>. They are <st data-num="3324" class="">rife</st> with<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5355" class="">envy</st>, <st data-num="5408" class="">murder</st>, <st data-num="2054" class="">strife</st>, <st data-num="1388" class="">deceit</st>, <st data-num="2550" class="">hostility</st>. They are <st data-num="5588" class="">gossips</st>,

<st data-num="2637" class="">slanderers</st>, <st data-num="2319">haters of God</st>, <st data-num="5197" class="">insolent</st>, <st data-num="5244" class="">arrogant</st>, <st data-num="213" class="">boastful</st>, <st data-num="2182" class="">contrivers</st> of <st data-num="2556">all sorts of evil</st>, <st data-num="545" class="">disobedient</st> to <st data-num="1118" class="">parents</st>,
<st data-num="801" class="">senseless</st>, <st data-num="802" class="">covenant-breakers</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="794" class="">heartless</st>, <st data-num="415" class="">ruthless</st>.
Although they fully know God’s righteous decree that those who practice such things deserve to die, they not only do them but also approve of those who practice them.
